# <span style="color:#003366">**Create a graph using the mpg dataset. Select any 5 different brands of your choice.**</span>

- **Labels and axis: 4 points**

- **Boxplot with filled boxes: 9 points**

```{r}
head(mpg)
```

```{r}
vis_dat(mpg)
```

## <span style="color:#003366">**Original plot:**</span>

![](C:/Users/HP/Documents/BusinessAnalyticsITESM/assets/FG3-1.png)

## <span style="color:#003366">**Answer:**</span>

```{r}
mpg %>%
  filter(manufacturer %in% c("dodge", "ford", "honda", "nissan", "toyota")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = manufacturer, y = cty, fill = manufacturer)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot by Víctor Benito García Rocha",
       x = "Auto Maker",
       y = "City MPG",
       fill = "Manufacturer") +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.title.x = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.title.y = element_text(color = "black"),
    legend.title = element_text(color = "black"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1)
  )
```
